name: Newsopoly
description:
The whole essence of the news media is not just about dissemination of information. It’s about power. In Newsopoly, you buy and sell all of the year's top World news stories, genres, and jobs while trying to avoid "Fake" news and getting penalized. The player who ends the game with most money without going bankrupt wins. Play Newsopoly today!

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
